::Skulletron::

        Skulletron looks at Feline, puzzled, as she asks him to fire 
on her a couple times.  That would be hard.  She was too beautiful
too 
beautiful for him to do that.  But then, his mind went towards the 
mission and he Alliance.


             "Alright then.  Anything to get this mission done!" 
Skulletron sighed as he grabbed his ray gun.

          He aimed it at her, finger on the trigger.  He clenched the 
gun tight, hands shaking.  Then he fired three blasts from his ray 
gun very quickly, shutting his eyes.
